body:
I've been running bitcoin-qt built from the git master branch recently and have seen it crash a few times. Unfortunately I got out of the habit of running it in a debugger so wasn't able to post a useful bug report. This time however it was running in gdb, so I captured stack traces.

I built against commit 2e8f9dc2bbb1200218feaf80344d35dca1cd6b25. I hope this is helpful. I realize the commit is a few weeks old now, but I figured it might be worth posting anyway.
